description: Dulcie is going on holiday to Disneyland Paris in May, funded by money raised by the public.
title: Eight year-old Telford girl rings cancer 'all-clear' bell
title_page: Eight year-old Telford girl rings cancer 'all-clear' bell - BBC News
maintext:
An eight-year old girl has rung an "all-clear" bell, marking the end of three years of cancer treatment.
Dulcie, from Telford, Shropshire, was diagnosed with a stage four neuroblastoma in 2021 and underwent chemotherapy, surgery and two sets of clinical trials.
She rang the bell on Monday, surrounded by staff lining the corridor at Birmingham Children's Hospital.
Dulcie was then surprised by her mum with a holiday to Disneyland Paris in May, which has been paid for with more than Â£3,300 in fundraising money.
